summary: The Curbing Offenses on Policing Services Act (COPS Act) aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code concerning offenses against officers and employees. The bill focuses on preventing the use of explosive materials in such offenses. It modifies penalties for assaulting, resisting, or impeding officers and employees, as well as increasing fines and prison sentences related to these actions. The bill also specifies that explosive materials fall into these categories of offenses.
